text:
<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. Erin and Mary were too far apart in age to have fights like many sisters do.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:Erin a :Person ;
    :name "Erin" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :sister :Mary .

:Mary a :Person ;
    :name "Mary" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :sister :Erin .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. Erin brought the mule carrots and Elizabeth brought him an apple; the mule loved the two sisters.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:Erin a :Person ;
    :name "Erin" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :sister :Elizabeth .

:Elizabeth a :Person ;
    :name "Elizabeth" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :sister :Erin .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. Mary milked the cow and her younger sister Erin milked the goat.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:Mary a :Person ;
    :name "Mary" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :sister :Erin .

:Erin a :Person ;
    :name "Erin" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :sister :Mary .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. The horse was Mary's favorite animal, but her sister Elizabeth was afraid of it.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:Mary a :Person ;
    :name "Mary" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :sister :Elizabeth .

:Elizabeth a :Person ;
    :name "Elizabeth" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :sister :Mary .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. Elizabeth and Erin rode the horse into town, with the two sisters sharing the saddle.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:Elizabeth a :Person ;
    :name "Elizabeth" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :sister :Erin .

:Erin a :Person ;
    :name "Erin" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :sister :Elizabeth .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. Elizabeth found a sick raccoon and tried to help it with her sister and future nurse Mary.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:Elizabeth a :Person ;
    :name "Elizabeth" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :sister :Mary .

:Mary a :Person ;
    :name "Mary" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :sister :Elizabeth .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. The tractor broke down, but JohnBoy didn't know how to fix it, but his younger brother Ben could.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:JohnBoy a :Person ;
    :name "JohnBoy" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :Ben .

:Ben a :Person ;
    :name "Ben" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :JohnBoy .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. Jason and Ben went to town to buy some candy at the brothers' favorite store.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:Jason a :Person ;
    :name "Jason" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :Ben .

:Ben a :Person ;
    :name "Ben" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :Jason .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. Jason let JimBob and his other brothers play with his pet duck.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:Jason a :Person ;
    :name "Jason" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :JimBob .

:JimBob a :Person ;
    :name "JimBob" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :Jason .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. Jason took the dog hunting while his brother JohnBoy went fishing.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:Jason a :Person ;
    :name "Jason" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :JohnBoy .

:JohnBoy a :Person ;
    :name "JohnBoy" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :Jason .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. Thieves came to steal the horse, but brothers JohnBoy and JimBob were ready for them.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:JohnBoy a :Person ;
    :name "JohnBoy" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :JimBob .

:JimBob a :Person ;
    :name "JimBob" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :JohnBoy .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. Ben and his brother JohnBoy saved the peacock from a mountain lion.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:Ben a :Person ;
    :name "Ben" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :JohnBoy .

:JohnBoy a :Person ;
    :name "JohnBoy" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :Ben .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. JimBob's peacock surpised Jason's visiting friends, but his brother explained that JimBob loved animals.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:JimBob a :Person ;
    :name "JimBob" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :Jason .

:Jason a :Person ;
    :name "Jason" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :JimBob .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. Jason and his sister Mary were in the back seat of the tractor with their brother Ben driving.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:Jason a :Person ;
    :name "Jason" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :sister :Mary ;
    :brother :Ben  .

:Mary a :Person ;
    :name "Mary" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :brother :Jason, :Ben .

:Ben a :Person ;
    :name "Ben" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :sister :Mary ;
    :brother :Jason  .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. Jason was the oldest of the Walton sons, and Elizabeth was the oldest of the Walton girls.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:Jason a :Person ;
    :name "Jason" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :sister :Elizabeth .

:Elizabeth a :Person ;
    :name "Elizabeth" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :brother :Jason .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. Erin was afraid of cows until her brother JohnBoy showed her how to milk them.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:JohnBoy a :Person ;
    :name "JohnBoy" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :sister :Erin .

:Erin a :Person ;
    :name "Erin" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :brother :JohnBoy .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. A cow kicked Erin and her her younger brother JimBob rushed to help.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:JimBob a :Person ;
    :name "JimBob" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :sister :Erin .

:Erin a :Person ;
    :name "Erin" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :brother :JimBob .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. Jason didn't let his sister Mary play with his peacock.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:Jason a :Person ;
    :name "Jason" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :sister :Mary .

:Mary a :Person ;
    :name "Mary" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :brother :Jason .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. The mule had a large appetite and looked forward to Erin and her brother JohnBoy feeding him.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:JohnBoy a :Person ;
    :name "JohnBoy" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :sister :Erin .

:Erin a :Person ;
    :name "Erin" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :brother :JohnBoy .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. The goat looked down from the roof on Erin and her brother Ben.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:Ben a :Person ;
    :name "Ben" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :sister :Erin .

:Erin a :Person ;
    :name "Erin" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :brother :Ben .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. With the deer, Erin still had fewer pets than her brother Jason.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:Jason a :Person ;
    :name "Jason" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :sister :Erin .

:Erin a :Person ;
    :name "Erin" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :brother :Jason .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. Mary's deer had to stay outside with her brother JohnBoy's peacock.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:JohnBoy a :Person ;
    :name "JohnBoy" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :sister :Mary .

:Mary a :Person ;
    :name "Mary" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :brother :JohnBoy .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. Mary gave her brother Jason a carrot to feed to the horse.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:Jason a :Person ;
    :name "Jason" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :sister :Mary .

:Mary a :Person ;
    :name "Mary" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :brother :Jason .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. Mary told Jason that a duck was a silly pet, but he ignored his sister.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:Jason a :Person ;
    :name "Jason" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :sister :Mary .

:Mary a :Person ;
    :name "Mary" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :brother :Jason .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. JohnBoy didn't see Mary coming, but his duck quacked a warning that his sister was behind him.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:JohnBoy a :Person ;
    :name "JohnBoy" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :sister :Mary .

:Mary a :Person ;
    :name "Mary" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :brother :JohnBoy .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. The peacock wandered around looking for JohnBoy, but Mary fed him instead of her brother.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:JohnBoy a :Person ;
    :name "JohnBoy" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :sister :Mary .

:Mary a :Person ;
    :name "Mary" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :brother :JohnBoy .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. Mary envied Jason his pets, and she hoped that the raccoon would catch her up to her brother.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:Jason a :Person ;
    :name "Jason" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :sister :Mary .

:Mary a :Person ;
    :name "Mary" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :brother :Jason .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. JimBob's canary wanted to ride on his sister Elizabeth's deer.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:JimBob a :Person ;
    :name "JimBob" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :sister :Elizabeth .

:Elizabeth a :Person ;
    :name "Elizabeth" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :brother :JimBob .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. JohnBoy picked wild raspberries, which his sister Elizabeth ate on ice cream.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:JohnBoy a :Person ;
    :name "JohnBoy" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :sister :Elizabeth .

:Elizabeth a :Person ;
    :name "Elizabeth" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :brother :JohnBoy .</s>
